column4: I got a USB dongle and I'm wondering if there's a driver for it for Linux, or how I would go about using it in Ubuntu
sorry I should of explained more clearly
ok I will try and get it
the linksys wusb54gc works out of the box
thanks, I will make a note of that and use it as a fall back plan, I should of really done my research on this and bought a well known supported one like that
you could get a wifimax dongle for NDS/PSP as well, ($20usd)
well.. I also hafe an atheros card in my laptop, I ndiswrapped it
i did that too in my laptop
I'm having difficulty finding a PSU that is mATX format and can has 24 pin connector..they seem to be hard to find!
micro ATX format, smaller than regular ATX sized
